name: Before you Leave
description:
Your only goal is to finish the game. Explore an open world to find people, puzzles, and remnants - or don’t.

Controls:

wasd/arrows - move
r - restart puzzle

Made by:

  • Ango Zhu (@infraxion, website) - Art, Sound, Narrative design
  • Andrew Wilson (@chao) - Coding, Art, Level Design
  • Kris Lee - Level Design, Narrative Design

Software Used:

  • Löve2D
  • Notepad++
  • Rexpaint
  • Paint.net
  • FL Studio
